description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the first Lunar Year. The first Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rat.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the first Lunar Year. The first Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rat.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o primeiro Ano Lunar. O primeiro Ano Lunar é dedicado ao Rato.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第一地支子，该年的生肖为鼠。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr der Maus aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Intelligenz um acht.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the first Lunar Year. The first Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rat.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the first Lunar Year. The first Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rat.
description.fr: Une Cape magnifiquement conçue, ornée d'un symbole qui représente la première Année Lunaire. La première Année Lunaire est dédiée au Rat.
description.id: Cloak yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Tahun Imlek pertama. Tahun Imlek pertama didedikasikan untuk Tikus.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the first Lunar Year. The first Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rat.
description.jp: 最初の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。最初の旧正月は子に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 첫해를 상징하는 상징으로 장식 된 아름답게 제작 된 망토. 첫 음력은 쥐에게 바쳐집니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the first Lunar Year. The first Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rat.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the first Lunar Year. The first Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rat.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом первого года китайского календаря - крысой.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el primer Año Lunar. El primer Año Lunar está dedicado a la Rata.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the first Lunar Year. The first Lunar Year is dedicated to the Rat.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติแรก ปีจันทรคติแรกอุทิศให้กับหนู
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖鼠年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng thủ công đẹp mắt được trang trí bằng biểu tượng đại diện cho Tết Nguyên đán đầu tiên. Năm Tết đầu tiên dành riêng cho người tuổi Tý
